data.title: School In-Charge & Teachers Recruitment in Midas High School, Nampally, Hyderabad
data.meta_description: Midas High School, Nampally, Hyderabad has published an appointment notice for the employment of various Teachers and the School In-charge. Candidates should apply for the teaching vacancies immediately.
data.text:
Midas High School, Nampally, Hyderabad has published an appointment notice for the employment of various Teachers and the School In-charge. Candidates should apply for the teaching vacancies immediately.

Employer: Midas High School

Address: Nampally, Hyderabad, Telangana, India

Email: Not mentioned in the advertisement

URL:Not Provided

Phone: 9502117404, 6302317795

Skills: Not mentioned in the advertisement

Experience: Not mentioned in the advertisement

Education: Not mentioned in the advertisement

Job Location: Hyderabad (View Jobs in Hyderabad Jobs in Telangana)

Want to get instant alerts about new jobs? Join us on Facebook

School In-Charge & Teachers Recruitment in Midas High School, Nampally, Hyderabad

Midas High School, Nampally, Hyderabad is inviting applications from dynamic, dedicated, qualified, and skilled candidates for the following positions.

Job profile:

1. School In-Charge

2. Part-time/ Full-time High School Teachers for English and Computer

Candidates should apply for the above job vacancies immediately.

The school is looking for lady teachers only.

No detailed qualifications and experience required for the said vacancies are mentioned in the advertisement.

Contact details:

Midas High School,

Nampally, Hyderabad,

Telangana, India

Eligible and interested candidates should contact the school authority by calling the school contact numbers furnished above.

The advertisement has been issued on 23.06.2023 but no last date for the submission of the applications is mentioned therein.

http://103.241.136.50/epaper/DC/HYD/510X798/2023-06-23/b_images/HYD_2023-06-23_maip2_9.jpg

About Employer

Midas High School is located in Nampally, Hyderabad
